wikipedia_page.main: Sonia Holm (24 February 1922 – 2 July 1974) was an English film actress. She trained at the Rank Organisation's "charm school".

response: It stars Googie Withers, Jean Kent, John McCallum, Derek Bond, Chips Rafferty and Sonia Holm. Some scenes were shot by director Robert Hamer when Frend was ill, though he was uncredited. The music was composed by Ralph Vaughan Williams.1948 Daily Mail Film Award Annual
* Sonia Holm as Lady Mollie Panniford
His first wife was the actress Sonia Holm. In 1954, he married Sandra Dorne, with whom he had occasionally co-starred.
Radio Cab Murder is a 1954 British crime film directed by Vernon Sewell and starring Jimmy Hanley, Lana Morris and Sonia Holm.
13 East Street is a 1952 British crime thriller film directed by Robert S. Baker and starring Patrick Holt,  Sandra Dorne and Sonia Holm.Mackillop & Sinyard p.180
